Controls
-----------------
L1+Left  :  Add Red
L1+Right  :  Subtract Red
L2+Left  :  Add Green
L2+Right  :  Subtract Green
R2+Left  :  Add Blue
R2+Right  :  Subtract Blue
L3+R3  :  Reset Colors
Notes: this is for R1 patch. Does not work online. Can be ported to use online if anyoneâ€™s interested.
-----------------
